name: Mobile Page should have a Long Description (PeopleSoft)
description: This rule reports Mobile Pages having no long description (field is empty).
output:
This report lists all Mobile Pages that have no long description.
It provides the following information:
- Mobile Page full name.
rationale:
Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code.
The long description (or comment) should be used to identify why the object has been created and why it has been modified.
remediation:
The long description must be filled.
Ideally, it is better to format it in order to ease the research.
alternativeName: Mobile Page should have a Long Description (PeopleSoft)
